streaming_engine.title: TV & Radio Streaming Engine packages
streaming_engine.subtitle: Host your channel on a platform built for broadcasters.
streaming_engine.note: Below are example packages. We tailor each deployment based on your channel count, expected viewers and contribution paths.

packages.name: TV Streaming
packages.tagline: Single TV channel on our streaming engine.
packages.best_for: Standalone TV stations and ministries starting with online streaming.
features: 1 x 24/7 TV channel on our streaming engine
SRT / IP contribution from your encoder
HLS output ready for web, mobile and Smart TV apps
Basic player page or embed for your existing website
Standard monitoring and support during working hours

packages.name: TV + Radio Streaming
packages.best_for: Media groups running both TV and Radio that want a unified platform.
features: 1 x TV channel + 1 x Radio channel on our engine
Embeddable players and integration with our apps
Basic analytics for live and catch-up viewers

packages.name: Streaming + Webpage
packages.tagline: Streaming plus a branded web presence.
packages.best_for: Channels that need both streaming and a professional landing website.
features: TV or TV+Radio streaming on our engine
Branded single-page or small website for your channel
Integrated live player, programme info and contact form

web_offerings.title: Website design, development & hosting
web_offerings.subtitle: Web presence for broadcasters, organisations and projects.

packages.name: Basic site
packages.summary: Clean one–three page website for channels, events or campaigns.
packages.ideal_for: Start-ups, ministries, community channels and small businesses.
highlights: Modern responsive design aligned with your brand
Up to 3 pages (Home, About, Contact or similar)

packages.name: Business site
packages.summary: Full company website with multiple sections and content.
packages.ideal_for: TV & Radio groups, integrators, SMEs, NGOs and agencies.
highlights: Structured navigation with services, projects and news sections
Blog or updates module for announcements
Integration with your live stream or external platforms
Basic on-page SEO and performance tuning

packages.name: Hosting & care
packages.summary: Secure hosting and ongoing technical care.
packages.ideal_for: Clients who want us to manage updates, backups and uptime.
highlights: Managed hosting on our infrastructure or your servers
SSL, basic security hardening and updates
Support channel for content or technical changes
